languages.text: When the wearer uses Press the Advantage, they and their allies increase their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用扩大优势时，装备者与所有盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高2点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Press the Advantage, they and their allies increase their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用扩大优势时，装备者与所有盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高2点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: При применении Дополнительного преимущества персонаж и его союзники повышают свою {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 2 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Press the Advantage, they and their allies increase their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При применении Дополнительного преимущества персонаж и его союзники повышают свою {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 2 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
При применении Дополнительного преимущества персонаж и его союзники повышают свою {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 2 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が優位の促進を使うと、使用者とその味方は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が2増える。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Press the Advantage, they and their allies increase their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が優位の促進を使うと、使用者とその味方は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が2増える。

languages.text: Si el portador usa Tomar la delantera, él y sus aliados aumentan su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} +2 durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Press the Advantage, they and their allies increase their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador usa Tomar la delantera, él y sus aliados aumentan su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} +2 durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rondas{/g}.

languages.text: Setzt der Träger Den Vorteil ausweiten ein, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} bei ihm und seinen Verbündeten 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang um +2.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Press the Advantage, they and their allies increase their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nutzt der Träger Den Vorteil ausweiten, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} bei ihm und seinen Verbündeten 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang um +2.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à Exploitation de l'avantage, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} et celle de ses alliés augmentent de +2 pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
